0.5.name: wordpress/macks-poker-news-feed
0.5.description:
Mack's Poker News Feed plugin incorporates an external RSS news feed into a cool looking Flash news feed. The feed moves from bottom to top, with a nice Poker graphic, followed by headlines and stories. You can click on a story title or summary to see the actual page where it is posted. You can also edit the width and height of the plugin to suit your needs. Finally, you can select how many articles you want to appear in the feed: 1 to 10.

Relevant Keywords: poker, poker games, card games, cards, wsop, world series of poker, las vegas, atlantic city, poker contests, poker news, poker results, poker players, poker coverage, poker in las vegas, poker in atlantic city

Thanks,

Mack Bincroft
